analysis.description:
Reentrancy in GoldmintPool.migrateToNewControllerContract (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#287-302):
	External calls:
	- core.setNewControllerAddress(newControllerAddr) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#291)
	- mntpTokenAmount = getMntpBalance() (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#293-296)
	- goldTokenAmount = getGoldBalance() (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#296)
	- mntpToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,mntpTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#297-298)
	- goldToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,goldTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#298-302)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isActualContractVer (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#302)

GoldmintPool.holdStake (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#218-230) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),mntpAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#224-225)

GoldmintPool.unholdStake (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#230-238) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#237)

GoldmintPool.distribShareProfit (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#238-250) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transferFrom(tokenBankAddress,address(this),mntpReward) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#241-243)
	-goldToken.transferFrom(tokenBankAddress,address(this),goldReward) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#245-246)

GoldmintPool.withdrawUserReward (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#250-271) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(msg.sender,mntpReward) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#263-264)
	-goldToken.transfer(msg.sender,goldReward) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#266-268)

GoldmintPool.migrateToNewControllerContract (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#287-302) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,mntpTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#297-298)
	-goldToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,goldTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#298-302)

Reentrancy in GoldmintPool.constructor (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#200-210):
	External calls:
	- mntpToken = core.mntpToken() (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#205-206)
	- goldToken = core.goldToken() (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#206-208)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- goldToken (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#206-208)
	- tokenBankAddress (/unique_chucks/10/0xb129ef53bef95c3e42bb296145fa310d6b447ef4.sol#209)
